welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Vendemiano, a charming city known for its rich history and stunning landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aviano Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
